sources: Ministry of Law, Justice and Parliamentary Affairs
Office of PM and Council of Ministers

news_articles.title: Congress rift deepens in Bagmati as four ministers quit
news_articles.text: Majority of lawmakers back no-confidence motion against Chief Minister Lama, push for Baniya as new chief minister.

news_articles.title: House extends term of probe panel investigating tampering with ‘cooling-off period’ clause
news_articles.text: The lower house unanimously approves a seven-day extension for the parliamentary committee.

news_articles.title: Former President Bhandari defends political comeback after UML bars her return
news_articles.text: Says party membership was renewed as per the constitution that protects her right to rejoin politics.

news_articles.title: 126 women in Kathmandu metropolis tested positive for HPV infection
news_articles.text: Types 16 and 18 of human papillomavirus, responsible for 70 percent of cervical cancers, were found to be responsible for the infection in 28 women.

news_articles.title: A prize now reduced to a joke
news_articles.text: It’s rare for a President to publicly show such fascination with the Nobel Peace Prize.

news_articles.title: President returns Constitutional Council bill to Parliament for reconsideration
news_articles.text: The head of state objects to the newly passed bill, calling it inconsistent with the spirit of the Constitution.

news_articles.title: RSP, RPP continue House protest over visit visa controversy
news_articles.text: Opposition parties demand high-level or parliamentary probe; Speaker proceeds despite protest.

news_articles.title: मौजुदा सूची दर्ता गर्ने सम्बन्धी सूचना - आ.व. २०८२-८३

official_notices.title: संघ, प्रदेश र स्थानीय तहमा सञ्चालन गरिने वार्षिक विकास कार्यक्रम (आ.व. २०८२।०८३) भाग-२

official_notices.title: मिति २०८२ असार ४ गते प्रकाशन गरिएको अध्यक्ष र विज्ञ सदस्य पदको व्यावसायिक कार्ययोजनाको प्रस्तुतीकरण तथा अन्तर्वार्ता कार्यक्रमको सूचना सच्याईएको सम्बन्धमा
official_notices.text: मिति २०८२ असार ४ गते प्रकाशन गरिएको अध्यक्ष र विज्ञ सदस्य पदको व्यावसायिक कार्ययोजनाको प्रस्तुतीकरण तथा अन्तर्वार्ता कार्यक्रमको सूचना सच्याईएको सम्बन्धमा
